• Recipients: Backend Team; QA & DevOps
• Purpose: Review API changes, share sample payload, and update docs
• Changes:
  1. Added `POST /v2/users` endpoint
     - Request body now requires `email_verified: boolean`
       * Must log timestamp in ISO format
       * Default to `false` if missing
     - Deprecates `username` field in response
  2. Error codes revamped for 400, 401, 403
  3. Rate limits set to 1000 RPM
• Sample payload (JSON):
  ```json
  {
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "email_verified": true,
    "roles": ["user","admin"]
  }
  ```
• Docs update: see `docs/api_v2.md` for full spec
• Deadline: EOD Friday (UTC−07:00)
